text: Herbert W. Franke (14 May 1927 â€“ 16 July 2022) was an Austrian scientist and writer. He was a computer artist. He created computer graphics and early digital art since the late 1950s. Franke worked on future research and speleology. Franke was born in Vienna, Austria. He died on 16 July 2022 in Egling, Germany at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Scientists from Vienna Category:Writers from Vienna
title: Herbert W. Franke
